page.title: 12Ecology
page.content:
Ecology
The commonest wild animal in Ilford is the Grey Squirrel. It is most frequently seen in our local parks. Shepherds Purse is the plant found in many parts of Ilford. Most birds in Ilford are Finches, but House Martins can be seen nesting under the eaves of many houses during the summer months.
Feral Pigeons, Blackbirds, Sparrows and Starlings frequent our local park, which is Valentines Park. Feral Pigeons are usually found on buildings and in the town. Quite a lot are found in the grounds of our school, Christchurch School. The Horse Chestnut is quite common in our local park as is the Oak and the Sycamore.
